title: Bomber Boys - Fighting Back 1940 - 1945
description: First UK Edition, 2007, first printing, 1 3 5 7 9 10 8 6 4 2, an almost like-new hardcover except for slight foxing spots on the 9uter edge and two tiney scratch marks near the top of the first page where a sticker was porbably removed, with a fine unclipped (L20) dust jacket, from HarperPress. By Patrick Bishop, previously author of the bestselling Fighter Boys. 429 pages including index. ISBN 978-0-00-718986-1.
author: Patrick Bishop
